snippet: Derick Brassard had a goal and an assist, and Coach Alain Vigneault earned his first win with the Rangers as they beat the host Philadelphia Flyers, 3-2, in a preseason game.
abstract: New York Rangers beat Philadelphia Flyers, 3-2, in preseason game.
lead_paragraph: Derick Brassard had a goal and an assist, and Coach Alain Vigneault earned his first win with the Rangers as they beat the host Philadelphia Flyers, 3-2, in a preseason game.

headline.main: Brassard Paces Rangers in Preseason Win
